00426 #define EXP_OP_LAST     0x2a    
00427 #define EXP_OP_EOR      0x2b    
00428 #define EXP_OP_DELAY    0x2c    
00429 #define EXP_OP_CASE     0x2d    
00430 #define EXP_OP_CASEX    0x2e    
00431 #define EXP_OP_CASEZ    0x2f    
00438 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_NONE) && \
00439                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00440                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00441                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00442                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00443                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00444                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00445                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00446                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00447                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00448                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND)) && \
00449                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00450 
00455 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x) & (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE(x->suppl) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE(x->suppl)))
